clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of BRM421 for Dry Eye Syndrome
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Double Masked, Placebo Controlled Clinical Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of BRM421 Ophthalmic Solution in Subjects With Dry Eye Using a Controlled Adverse Environment (CAE®) Model

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to compare the safety and efficacy of BRM421 Ophthalmic Solution to placebo for the treatment of the signs and symptoms of dry eye.

intervention.description: A topical solution containing BRM421 active
